name: Fallen Leaves Pendant Necklace - Sterling Silver
description: I've designed four sterling silver Ivy leaves and vine work which surround a center and movable, 8mm gemstone of your choice! This piece is approximately 3 inches in length and 2 1/2 inches across. Each are hand-made so subtle variances will occur in the fabrication of the pendant. The center stone is hinged so it has movement to bring light and life to the piece...and it creates fun to play with when worn! I've attached a sterling silver chain on either ends of the necklace to fit at the collarbone; approximately 16-17" in length total.

name: Celtic Trinity Knot Pendant Necklace with Ivy Leaves
description:
I have designed this pendant necklace in sterling silver with a Celtic and Ivy leaf motif and infused with Elvish characteristics. I've used four Celtic Trinity Knots with two, hand-fabricated ivy leaves extending from either side, and your choice of a 10mm round gemstone can be set! This piece is approximately 3 inches in height and 2 1/2 inches in diameter. 

I have soldered a 16 inch sterling silver box chain, on opposite ends, for security.

This will come in a jewelry box within a felt pouch for safe keeping!

name: Trinity Knot Gemstone Celtic Pendant Necklace with 16 Inch Box Chain .925
description:
I've fabricated a 5 Trinity Knot Celtic pendant, which can accompany many bridal Celtic headpiece designs, as well as a stand-out pendant necklace on its own! It's designed in sterling silver as well as the box chain that comes with it.

This will feature an Amethyst 10mm round cabochon, since I love this magical gemstone. Being a believer of gemstone energy, the Amethyst is said to protect the wearer from harm, and offering healing energy for the mind and spirit.

This piece will include an already attached 16" sterling silver box chain for a total length of 18 1/2" when worn, as the pendant itself is approximately 2 1/2" across.

**Please note that I make each one, per order, so as to retain artistic integrity. The one shown in the images is for details only.**

Please allow 7 business days for me to fabricate your pendant and I will send a shipment notification the moment it's ready!

name: Ivy Leaf Bracelet Wrap Cuff
description:
I've designed an ivy leaf themed bracelet wrap cuff, much similar to the ivy headpiece but this can be worn for many occasions, such as a themed wedding event, or a Renaissance Faire, or just going about town on an eventful evening!

This all sterling silver bracelet wrap can be molded and manipulated to fit any way you wish upon your arm...really, where ever your preferences may be! The wrap is approximately 8 inches in length so there's room for adjustment. Each are made individually, with heart and care and attention to details...so while they are all unique, each will envelop a very similar look to this piece.

I've hand-drawn and cut each leaf, then added a life-like texturing to the leaves for a realistic appearance. The wrap can be made to fit a wrist size between 6 - 6 1/2 inches. Please convo me if you need it larger.

Allow me 2-3 business days to complete your piece and it will be shipped in a felt pouch, within a white box for safekeeping. Feel free to convo me any questions you may have and thank you for looking!
